tool_description: Daily Starting Lineups for the following sportsZ: NFL, NBA, MLB, WNBA, NHL, College Basketball, Euro League Basketball, & Soccer. (French Ligue, Spanish La Liga, Italian Series A, Gerrman Bundesliga, MLS, UEFA Champions League, & League Mexico)
name: Lineups
title: Lineups

api_list.name: Get Sport List
api_list.description: Use this API to get a list of sports and the corresponding key for each sport.  They key can be used in the Get Lineups endpoint to get the lineups for a give sport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lineups3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sport-list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lineups3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Lineups
api_list.description: Simply supply the api with the sport code, and get the projected/confirmed lineups for each sport. Sport codes can be fetched using the Get Sports endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lineups3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/get-lineups/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lineups3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lineups3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/get-lineups/{sportid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lineups3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
